alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:45AM EDT until June 12 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 515 AM EDT. * At 445 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Smithville to 6 miles southeast of Dawson to 7 miles north of Morgan, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Albany, Shellman, Smithville, East Albany, Turner City, Walker, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Chokee, Stocks, Forrester, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Palmyra, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P and Aycock Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell; Worth
